name: P90X iCal Generator
short_description:
Generate P90X and P90X3 calendars in iCal (.ics file) format for importing into Google Calendar or Microsoft Outlook, and others.

Built-in support for generating calendars from a list of events in a text file. Simply select that option from the drop-down and when everything is set, click "Save" to begin the process of loading the text file. Each line will be a single event and each event will be scheduled daily. Enter "[SKIP]" for any days that no event should be scheduled.

Use the "Modify" tab to insert a delay in an existing, downloaded iCal file at a specified date and duration.  Just starting out with P90X and find yourself too sore to continue with the next week? Insert a delay of 7 days to take the week off and continue where you left off later. Going on vacation? Insert a delay. But don't be a vegetable!

Updates are not fully tested and you may have to just delete the old calendar and import the modified version if it does not work.

Requires .NET 4.0 client profile
summary: Generate P90X & P90X3 iCal Calendars - Windows Only
